article.headline: Texas-Arlington 85, SE Louisiana 73
article.story: ARLINGTON, Texas -- Marquez Haynes led four Texas-Arlington players in double figures as the Mavericks easily defeated Southeastern Louisiana 85-73 Wednesday night. Brandon Long scored 12 points, Dwight Gentry 11 and Tommy Moffitt 10 points and nine rebounds for Texas-Arlington (14-10, 6-5 Southland), which never trailed in the game, shooting 50 percent from the field, and led by as many as 19. The Mavericks held a 39-25 advantage at halftime. Southeastern Louisiana got within nine with 2:35 to play, but Moffitt scored on a pass from Haynes to make it 76-65 and the Lions didn't threaten again. Patrick Sullivan, despite foul trouble, led the Lions (14-10, 6-5) with 21 points. Sullivan was 8-for-13 from the field in 24 minutes. Rodney Jones scored 15 for Southeastern Louisiana and Deshawn Patterson had 13.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
